DOC.brief_summary: Diabetic foot complication common costly problem . Excessive plantar pressure due foot deformity and/or limited ankle dorsiflexion , especially presence peripheral neuropathy , predispose subject diabetes diabetic foot ulcer . Achilles tendon lengthen surgery show delay prevent recurrence diabetic foot ulcer . Studies show Shockwave Therapy ( EPAT - Extracorporeal Pulse Activation Technology ) effective treat subject chronic heel pain Achilles tendonitis serious side effect . EPAT , therefore , may allow diabetic patient ankle equinus perform effective stretching exercise may prevent recurrence diabetic foot ulcer . The purposed RCT compare effectiveness manual manipulation EPAT versus manual manipulation alone ankle dorsiflexion dynamic plantar pressure at-risk subject history diabetic foot ulcer .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Manual Manipulation With EPAT Ankle Dorsiflexion Dynamic Plantar Pressure
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 21 65 , inclusive Diabetes , either type 1 2 Ankle equinus ( < 0ยบ passive ankle dorsiflexion knee extend ) Forefoot plantar hyperkeratosis ( callus ) Able walk independently without use walking aid ( cane , crutch , walker ) Able understand information inform consent form willing able comply studyrelated procedure Previous history anklefoot surgery amputation active low extremity skin ulcer Peripheral vascular disease ( nonpalpable pedal pulse ankle brachial index < 0.8 ) Not willing able make require visit Nursing pregnant Not willing able follow procedure specify protocol and/or instruction study personnel , include discontinuation icing , NSAIDs natural antiinflammatory agent ( Arnica )
